```{r}

library(dplyr)
library(lubridate)

data_before <- read.csv('/storage1/fs1/seethu/Active/Schnuckstar/transcation_(256-338)_before.csv')
data_after <- read.csv('/storage1/fs1/seethu/Active/Schnuckstar/transcation_(256-338)_after.csv')

data_after <- data_after %>% select(, -1)
```

```{r}
data_224 <- read.csv('/storage1/fs1/seethu/Active/Schnuckstar/TRANSACTION_LOYALTY_RANDOM_SAMPLE000000000224.csv')
data_224$date <- sapply(data_224$transaction_dttm, function(x){strsplit(x," ")[[1]][[1]]})
data_224$date <- as.Date(as.character(data_224$date))

data_before_224 <- data_224 %>% 
  filter(date >= as.Date('2019-03-01')) %>% 
  filter(date <= as.Date('2020-02-29'))

data_after_224 <- data_224 %>% 
  filter(date >= as.Date('2020-03-01')) %>% 
  filter(date <= as.Date('2021-02-28'))

data_before <- rbind(data_before, data_before_224)
data_after <- rbind(data_after, data_after_224)
```

```{r}

write.csv(data_before, '/storage1/fs1/seethu/Active/Schnuckstar/transcation_(256-338)_before.csv')
write.csv(data_after, '/storage1/fs1/seethu/Active/Schnuckstar/transcation_(256-338)_after.csv')
```
